Shopify Slideshow Section

Learn how to create a Slideshow section with Sections Pro in Shopify

Description of the Section

The Slideshow section, created with the Sections Pro app for Shopify, is designed to enhance your online store with a dynamic and engaging visual experience. This section allows you to showcase a series of images or videos in a seamless slideshow format, customized to your style and branding preferences. The Slideshow section is versatile, making it suitable for various types of content, from product features to promotional banners.

Demo of the Section

Installation Instructions

  1. Download the Sections Pro app on the Shopify App Store
  2. Open the app and navigate to Free Sections
  3. Search for "Slideshow"
  4. Click to Publish or Purchase

Sample Use Cases for a Shopify E-commerce Store

  1. Product Highlights: Use the slideshow to highlight your best-selling products or new arrivals. Each slide can feature a high-quality image or video, along with a brief description.

  2. Seasonal Promotions: Create a slideshow to showcase your seasonal sales and promotions. This can help capture customer interest and increase conversions.

  3. Customer Testimonials: Display customer testimonials with images or video feedback in the slideshow to build trust and credibility.

  4. Brand Storytelling: Use the slideshow to tell your brand story visually, including images and videos about your brand's journey, values, and milestones.

  5. Featured Collections: Highlight different product collections, allowing customers to scroll through and discover various product categories within your store.

Overview of the Configuration Settings

  • Font Settings:

    • Override theme fonts: Enables the use of custom fonts rather than the theme's default fonts.
    • Text Font: Choose from various font styles for text in the slideshow.

  • Text Settings:

    • Text Size: Adjust the size of the text within the slideshow.
    • Text Color: Set a custom color for the text.

  • Color Settings:

    • Background Color: Change the section's background color.
    • Caption Background Color: Adjust the background color for captions.
    • Progress Background Color: Customize the background color of the progress bar.
    • Progress Foreground Color: Customize the progress bar's foreground color.
    • Indicator Color: Set the color for the slide indicators.

  • Dimension Settings:

    • Max Width of Section: Define the maximum width of the slideshow section.
    • Padding: Adjust the padding for the top, bottom, left, and right sides of the section.

  • Slideshow Settings:

    • Round Borders on Media: Customize the border radius for media elements.
    • Subtle Shadow on Media: Enable or disable a shadow effect on media elements.
    • Media Aspect Ratio: Choose the aspect ratio for media files.
    • Mobile Media Aspect Ratio: Define a different aspect ratio for mobile devices.
    • Image Width: Specify the width for images requested from Shopify.
    • Mobile Image Width: Set the width for mobile images.
    • Enable Autoplay: Toggle the autoplay feature for the slideshow.
    • Show Arrows: Show or hide navigation arrows in the slideshow.
    • Autoplay Time: Set the duration for autoplay intervals.

  • Block Settings:

    • Image Block:

      • Image: Select an image for the slide.
      • Mobile Image: Option to choose a different image for mobile devices.
      • Caption: Add text to appear as a caption on the slide.

    • Video Block:

      • Video: Upload a video file.
      • Caption: Add text to serve as a caption.
      • Various controls: Options for muting, looping, autoplaying, and displaying controls for the video.
